class.name: ReCaptchaResponse
class.description: A ReCaptchaResponse is returned from recaptcha_check_answer()

class.name: Intrusion
class.description: PHP IDS

class.name: IdsComponent
class.description: The CakePHP IDS component

class.name: IDS_Monitor
class.description: Monitoring engine

class.name: HTMLPurifier_IDAccumulator
class.description: Component of HTMLPurifier_AttrContext that accumulates IDs to prevent dupes

class.name: HTMLPurifier_UnitConverter
class.description: Class for converting between different unit-lengths as specified by CSS.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_VarParserException
class.description: Exception type for HTMLPurifier_VarParser

class.name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLDefinition
class.description: Definition of the purified HTML that describes allowed children, attributes, and many other things.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule_List
class.description: XHTML 1.1 List Module, defines list-oriented elements. Core Module.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule_Image
class.description: XHTML 1.1 Image Module provides basic image embedding.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule_Legacy
class.description: XHTML 1.1 Legacy module defines elements that were previously deprecated.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule_StyleAttribute
class.description: XHTML 1.1 Edit Module, defines editing-related elements. Text Extension Module.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule_Tidy_Name
class.description: Name is deprecated, but allowed in strict doctypes, so onl

class.name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule_Scripting
class.description: XHTML 1.1 Scripting module, defines elements that are used to contain information pertaining to executable scripts or the lack of support for executable scripts.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule_SafeEmbed
class.description: A "safe" embed module. See SafeObject. This is a proprietary element.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule_Proprietary
class.description: Module defines proprietary tags and attributes in HTML.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule_Forms
class.description: XHTML 1.1 Forms module, defines all form-related elements found in HTML 4.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule_Presentation
class.description: XHTML 1.1 Presentation Module, defines simple presentation-related markup. Text Extension Module.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule_Object
class.description: XHTML 1.1 Object Module, defines elements for generic object inclusion

class.name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule_Bdo
class.description: XHTML 1.1 Bi-directional Text Module, defines elements that declare directionality of content. Text Extension Module.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule_Tables
class.description: XHTML 1.1 Tables Module, fully defines accessible table elements.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule_SafeObject
class.description: A "safe" object module. In theory, objects permitted by this module will be safe, and untrusted users can be allowed to embed arbitrary flash objects (maybe other types too, but only Flash is supported as of right now).

class.name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule_Edit
class.description: XHTML 1.1 Edit Module, defines editing-related elements. Text Extension Module.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule_Tidy
class.description: Abstract class for a set of proprietary modules that clean up (tidy) poorly written HTML.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule_Text
class.description: XHTML 1.1 Text Module, defines basic text containers. Core Module.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule_Target
class.description: XHTML 1.1 Target Module, defines target attribute in link elements.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule_Ruby
class.description: XHTML 1.1 Ruby Annotation Module, defines elements that indicate short runs of text alongside base text for annotation or pronounciation.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule_Hypertext
class.description: XHTML 1.1 Hypertext Module, defines hypertext links. Core Module.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_Exception
class.description: Global exception class for HTML Purifier; any exceptions we throw are from here.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_Filter_ExtractStyleBlocks
class.description: This filter extracts <style> blocks from input HTML, cleans them up using CSSTidy, and then places them in $purifier->context->get('StyleBlocks') so they can be used elsewhere in the document.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_URI_IPv6
class.description: Validates an IPv6 address.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_URI_IPv4
class.description: Validates an IPv4 address

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_URI_Email_SimpleCheck
class.description: Primitive email validation class based on the regexp found at http://www.regular-expressions.info/email.html

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_URI_Host
class.description: Validates a host according to the IPv4, IPv6 and DNS (future) specifications.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_CSS
class.description: Validates the HTML attribute style, otherwise known as CSS.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_Integer
class.description: Validates an integer.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_Enum
class.description: Validates a keyword against a list of valid values.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_Text
class.description: Validates arbitrary text according to the HTML spec.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_CSS_Multiple
class.description: Framework class for strings that involve multiple values.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_CSS_Color
class.description: Validates Color as defined by CSS.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_CSS_TextDecoration
class.description: Validates the value for the CSS property text-decoration

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_CSS_BackgroundPosition
class.description: Validates the value of background-position.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_CSS_Percentage
class.description: Validates a Percentage as defined by the CSS spec.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_CSS_FontFamily
class.description: Validates a font family list according to CSS spec

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_CSS_Border
class.description: Validates the border property as defined by CSS.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_CSS_Number
class.description: Validates a number as defined by the CSS spec.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_CSS_DenyElementDecorator
class.description: Decorator which enables CSS properties to be disabled for specific elements.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_CSS_Length
class.description: Represents a Length as defined by CSS.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_CSS_Composite
class.description: Allows multiple validators to attempt to validate attribute.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_CSS_ImportantDecorator
class.description: Decorator which enables !important to be used in CSS values.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_CSS_ListStyle
class.description: Validates shorthand CSS property list-style.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_CSS_Background
class.description: Validates shorthand CSS property background.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_CSS_Filter
class.description: Microsoft's proprietary filter: CSS property

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_CSS_Font
class.description: Validates shorthand CSS property font.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_CSS_URI
class.description: Validates a URI in CSS syntax, which uses url('http://example.com')

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_Lang
class.description: Validates the HTML attribute lang, effectively a language code.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_Switch
class.description: Decorator that, depending on a token, switches between two definitions.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_URI
class.description: Validates a URI as defined by RFC 3986.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_HTML_Nmtokens
class.description: Validates contents based on NMTOKENS attribute type.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_HTML_Color
class.description: Validates a color according to the HTML spec.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_HTML_Pixels
class.description: Validates an integer representation of pixels according to the HTML spec.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_HTML_ID
class.description: Validates the HTML attribute ID.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_HTML_Length
class.description: Validates the HTML type length (not to be confused with CSS's length).

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_HTML_Bool
class.description: Validates a boolean attribute

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_HTML_FrameTarget
class.description: Special-case enum attribute definition that lazy loads allowed frame targets

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_HTML_MultiLength
class.description: Validates a MultiLength as defined by the HTML spec.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef_HTML_LinkTypes
class.description: Validates a rel/rev link attribute against a directive of allowed values

class.name: HTMLPurifier_StringHash
class.description: This is in almost every respect equivalent to an array except that it keeps track of which keys were accessed.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_Strategy
class.description: Supertype for classes that define a strategy for modifying/purifying tokens.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrDef
class.description: Base class for all validating attribute definitions.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_DefinitionCache
class.description: Abstract class representing Definition cache managers that implements useful common methods and is a factory.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_Printer_ConfigForm_NullDecorator
class.description: Printer decorator for directives that accept null

class.name: HTMLPurifier_Printer_ConfigForm_default
class.description: Swiss-army knife configuration form field printer

class.name: HTMLPurifier_Printer_ConfigForm_bool
class.description: Bool form field printer

class.name: HTMLPurifier_VarParser
class.description: Parses string representations into their corresponding native PHP variable type. The base implementation does a simple type-check.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_Definition
class.description: Super-class for definition datatype objects, implements serialization functions for the class.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrTransform
class.description: Processes an entire attribute array for corrections needing multiple values.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_Strategy_Core
class.description: Core strategy composed of the big four strategies.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_Strategy_MakeWellFormed
class.description: Takes tokens makes them well-formed (balance end tags, etc.)

class.name: HTMLPurifier_Strategy_ValidateAttributes
class.description: Validate all attributes in the tokens.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_Strategy_RemoveForeignElements
class.description: Removes all unrecognized tags from the list of tokens.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_Strategy_Composite
class.description: Composite strategy that runs multiple strategies on tokens.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_Strategy_FixNesting
class.description: Takes a well formed list of tokens and fixes their nesting.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_Lexer
class.description: Forgivingly lexes HTML (SGML-style) markup into tokens.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_ChildDef_Table
class.description: Definition for tables

class.name: HTMLPurifier_ChildDef_Optional
class.description: Definition that allows a set of elements, and allows no children.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_ChildDef_Required
class.description: Definition that allows a set of elements, but disallows empty children.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_ChildDef_StrictBlockquote
class.description: Takes the contents of blockquote when in strict and reformats for validation.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_ChildDef_Empty
class.description: Definition that disallows all elements.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_ChildDef_Custom
class.description: Custom validation class, accepts DTD child definitions

class.name: HTMLPurifier_ChildDef_Chameleon
class.description: Definition that uses different definitions depending on context.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_ConfigDef
class.description: Base class for configuration entity

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrValidator
class.description: Validates the attributes of a token. Doesn't manage required attributes very well. The only reason we factored this out was because RemoveForeignElements also needed it besides ValidateAttributes.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_DefinitionCacheFactory
class.description: Responsible for creating definition caches.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_PercentEncoder
class.description: Class that handles operations involving percent-encoding in URIs.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_URISchemeRegistry
class.description: Registry for retrieving specific URI scheme validator objects.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_LanguageFactory
class.description: Class responsible for generating HTMLPurifier_Language objects, managing caching and fallbacks.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_Language
class.description: Represents a language and defines localizable string formatting and other functions, as well as the localized messages for HTML Purifier.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_ErrorCollector
class.description: Error collection class that enables HTML Purifier to report HTML problems back to the user

class.name: HTMLPurifier_StringHashParser
class.description: Parses string hash files. File format is as such:

class.name: HTMLPurifier_Encoder
class.description: A UTF-8 specific character encoder that handles cleaning and transforming.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_EntityParser
class.description: Handles referencing and derefencing character entities

class.name: HTMLPurifier_Context
class.description: Registry object that contains information about the current context.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrCollections
class.description: Defines common attribute collections that modules reference

class.name: HTMLPurifier_VarParser_Native
class.description: This variable parser uses PHP's internal code engine. Because it does this, it can represent all inputs; however, it is dangerous and cannot be used by users.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_VarParser_Flexible
class.description: Performs safe variable parsing based on types which can be used by users. This may not be able to represent all possible data inputs, however.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_URIScheme_mailto
class.description: Validates mailto (for E-mail) according to RFC 2368

class.name: HTMLPurifier_URIScheme_http
class.description: Validates http (HyperText Transfer Protocol) as defined by RFC 2616

class.name: HTMLPurifier_URIScheme_https
class.description: Validates https (Secure HTTP) according to http scheme.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_URIScheme_nntp
class.description: Validates nntp (Network News Transfer Protocol) as defined by generic RFC 1738

class.name: HTMLPurifier_URIScheme_news
class.description: Validates news (Usenet) as defined by generic RFC 1738

class.name: HTMLPurifier_URIScheme_ftp
class.description: Validates ftp (File Transfer Protocol) URIs as defined by generic RFC 1738.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_ElementDef
class.description: Structure that stores an HTML element definition. Used by HTMLPurifier_HTMLDefinition and HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_Doctype
class.description: Represents a document type, contains information on which modules need to be loaded.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_Token
class.description: Abstract base token class that all others inherit from.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_Length
class.description: Represents a measurable length, with a string numeric magnitude and a unit. This object is immutable.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_Generator
class.description: Generates HTML from tokens.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_Config
class.description: Configuration object that triggers customizable behavior.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_EntityLookup
class.description: Object that provides entity lookup table from entity name to character

class.name: HTMLPurifier_ConfigDef_Directive
class.description: Structure object containing definition of a directive.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_ConfigDef_Namespace
class.description: Structure object describing of a namespace

class.name: HTMLPurifier_ConfigDef_DirectiveAlias
class.description: Structure object describing a directive alias

class.name: HTMLPurifier_Injector
class.description: Injects tokens into the document while parsing for well-formedness.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_Lexer_DirectLex
class.description: Our in-house implementation of a parser.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_Lexer_PEARSax3
class.description: Proof-of-concept lexer that uses the PEAR package XML_HTMLSax3 to parse HTML.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_Lexer_DOMLex
class.description: Parser that uses PHP 5's DOM extension (part of the core).

class.name: HTMLPurifier_Lexer_PH5P
class.description: Experimental HTML5-based parser using Jeroen van der Meer's PH5P library.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_ConfigSchema_ValidatorAtom
class.description: Fluent interface for validating the contents of member variables.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_ConfigSchema_Exception
class.description: Exceptions related to configuration schema

class.name: HTMLPurifier_ConfigSchema_Interchange_Directive
class.description: Interchange component class describing configuration directives.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_ConfigSchema_Interchange_Id
class.description: Represents a directive ID in the interchange format.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_ConfigSchema_Interchange_Namespace
class.description: Interchange component class describing namespaces.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_ConfigSchema_Validator
class.description: Performs validations on HTMLPurifier_ConfigSchema_Interchange

class.name: HTMLPurifier_ConfigSchema_Builder_Xml
class.description: Converts HTMLPurifier_ConfigSchema_Interchange to an XML format, which can be further processed to generate documentation.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_ConfigSchema_Builder_ConfigSchema
class.description: Converts HTMLPurifier_ConfigSchema_Interchange to our runtime representation used to perform checks on user configuration.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_ConfigSchema_Interchange
class.description: Generic schema interchange format that can be converted to a runtime representation (HTMLPurifier_ConfigSchema) or HTML documentation. Members are completely validated.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_TagTransform
class.description: Defines a mutation of an obsolete tag into a valid tag.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_TokenFactory
class.description: Factory for token generation.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_ChildDef
class.description: Defines allowed child nodes and validates tokens against it.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrTransform_Name
class.description: Pre-transform that changes deprecated name attribute to ID if necessary

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrTransform_BoolToCSS
class.description: Pre-transform that changes converts a boolean attribute to fixed CSS

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrTransform_Border
class.description: Pre-transform that changes deprecated border attribute to CSS.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrTransform_Length
class.description: Class for handling width/height length attribute transformations to CSS

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrTransform_BdoDir
class.description: Post-trasnform that ensures that bdo tags have the dir attribute set.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrTransform_SafeObject
class.description: Writes default type for all objects. Currently only supports flash.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrTransform_EnumToCSS
class.description: Generic pre-transform that converts an attribute with a fixed number of values (enumerated) to CSS.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrTransform_SafeParam
class.description: Validates name/value pairs in param tags to be used in safe objects. This will only allow name values it recognizes, and pre-fill certain attributes with required values.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrTransform_BgColor
class.description: Pre-transform that changes deprecated bgcolor attribute to CSS.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrTransform_Lang
class.description: Post-transform that copies lang's value to xml:lang (and vice-versa)

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrTransform_Input
class.description: Performs miscellaneous cross attribute validation and filtering for input elements. This is meant to be a post-transform.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrTransform_Background
class.description: Pre-transform that changes proprietary background attribute to CSS.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrTransform_ImgSpace
class.description: Pre-transform that changes deprecated hspace and vspace attributes to CSS

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrTransform_ImgRequired
class.description: Transform that supplies default values for the src and alt attributes in img tags, as well as prevents the img tag from being removed because of a missing alt tag. This needs to be registered as both a pre and post attribute transform.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrTransform_Textarea
class.description: Sets height/width defaults for <textarea>

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrTransform_ScriptRequired
class.description: Implements required attribute stipulation for <script>

class.name: HTMLPurifier_TagTransform_Simple
class.description: Simple transformation, just change tag name to something else, and possibly add some styling. This will cover most of the deprecated tag cases.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_TagTransform_Font
class.description: Transforms FONT tags to the proper form (SPAN with CSS styling)

class.name: HTMLPurifier_HTMLModule
class.description: Represents an XHTML 1.1 module, with information on elements, tags and attributes.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_AttrTypes
class.description: Provides lookup array of attribute types to HTMLPurifier_AttrDef objects

class.name: HTMLPurifier_CSSDefinition
class.description: Defines allowed CSS attributes and what their values are.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_Filter
class.description: Represents a pre or post processing filter on HTML Purifier's output

class.name: HTMLPurifier_ErrorStruct
class.description: Records errors for particular segments of an HTML document such as tokens, attributes or CSS properties. They can contain error structs (which apply to components of what they represent), but their main purpose is to hold errors applying to whatever struct is being used.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_Bootstrap
class.description: Bootstrap class that contains meta-functionality for HTML Purifier such as the autoload function.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_URIScheme
class.description: Validator for the components of a URI for a specific scheme

class.name: HTMLPurifier_DefinitionCache_Decorator_Memory
class.description: Definition cache decorator class that saves all cache retrievals to PHP's memory; good for unit tests or circumstances where there are lots of configuration objects floating around.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_DefinitionCache_Decorator_Cleanup
class.description: Definition cache decorator class that cleans up the cache whenever there is a cache miss.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_DefinitionCache_Null
class.description: Null cache object to use when no caching is on.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_ConfigSchema
class.description: Configuration definition, defines directives and their defaults.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_Injector_PurifierLinkify
class.description: Injector that converts configuration directive syntax %Namespace.Directive to links

class.name: HTMLPurifier_Injector_AutoParagraph
class.description: Injector that auto paragraphs text in the root node based on double-spacing.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_Injector_SafeObject
class.description: Adds important param elements to inside of object in order to make things safe.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_Injector_DisplayLinkURI
class.description: Injector that displays the URL of an anchor instead of linking to it, in addition to showing the text of the link.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_Injector_Linkify
class.description: Injector that converts http, https and ftp text URLs to actual links.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_URIParser
class.description: Parses a URI into the components and fragment identifier as specified by RFC 3986.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_Token_Start
class.description: Concrete start token class.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_Token_Tag
class.description: Abstract class of a tag token (start, end or empty), and its behavior.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_Token_End
class.description: Concrete end token class.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_Token_Text
class.description: Concrete text token class.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_Token_Comment
class.description: Concrete comment token class. Generally will be ignored.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_Token_Empty
class.description: Concrete empty token class.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_URIFilter
class.description: Chainable filters for custom URI processing.

class.name: HTMLPurifier_URI
class.description: HTML Purifier's internal representation of a URI.

class.name: HTMLPurifier
class.description: Facade that coordinates HTML Purifier's subsystems in order to purify HTML.

class.name: IDS_Filter_Storage
class.description: Filter Storage

class.name: IDS_Init
class.description: Framework initiation

class.name: IDS_Caching_Session
class.description: File caching wrapper

class.name: IDS_Caching
class.description: Caching factory

class.name: IDS_Caching_Memcached
class.description: File caching wrapper

class.name: IDS_Caching_File
class.description: File caching wrapper

class.name: IDS_Caching_Database
class.description: Database caching wrapper

class.name: IDS_Log_File
class.description: File logging wrapper

class.name: IDS_Log_Email
class.description: Email logging wrapper

class.name: IDS_Log_Composite
class.description: Log Composite

class.name: IDS_Log_Database
class.description: Database logging wrapper

class.name: IDS_Event
class.description: PHPIDS event object

class.name: IDS_Converter
class.description: PHPIDS specific utility class to convert charsets manually

class.name: IDS_Filter
class.description: PHPIDS Filter object

class.name: IDS_Report
class.description: PHPIDS report object
